âœ”Toxic Rabbits + Echo Basement @ Six dogs





Facebook Photo

On Thursday, November 7th, Toxic Rabbits will present City of Dead Lights, the debut album of the post punk quartet in Athens.
City of Dead Lights, is a slap in the face of contemporary urban conformism through the punk tunes and existential lyrics of courtesy singer Dana Kassimi. The album, consisting of 10 tracks, with "Vertigo" being the first single, has been released since May 3 on CD and digital and limited vinyl release from sound effect records.
Echo Basement is a post-rock, progressive, post-metal band based in Athens. Atmospheric and rhythmic tracks, melodic, slow-paced orchestras, but also explosions in an experiment that is still going on. In 2011, they released their first EP entitled "Stop Rewind Play", while in 2016 they released their first full-length album entitled "Placid".
In 2019 they released their second album "No Form Of Human Government" by Rudu Records.

07/11, 6 d.o.g.s, Avramiotou 6 - 8, Monastiraki, 21:00, Entry: 5 euros.


âœ”Midnight City 2: Clock DVA, Body of Light, Blakaut & more @ Temple Athens





Facebook Photo

The second Midnight City is set to dominate the legendary Clock DVA on Saturday, November 9, 2019 and this will be appropriately dressed as they frame a very special lineup for yet another unique night.
Midnight Cit is a special series of single nights. City lights and lights, pitch sounds and engine sounds, voices, silences and echoes. In an electrified city, after midnight.
Clock DVAs play at Temple Athens with Body of Light, Blakaut and Kymatropika.
Dj sets by: Roman & Sarantis, Unhuman, Dj Stealth, Doctor Xou.

9/11, Midnight City, Temple Athens, Iakou 17, Gazi, Athens, Doors 21:00, Sell: 20 â‚¬, Cash: 22 â‚¬, 8 â‚¬ (club event - after 01:00).


LBlend Mishkin @ Rudu Bar





Facebook photo

On Friday November 8th, the decks of Rudu Bar are flooded with dub and rootsreggae sounds of "meter" in kind, BLEND MISHKIN.
Musician, producer, and DJ, Blend Mishkin is a founding member of the cast Cast-a-blast in Athens in 2006 and co-creator of the Jamaican Bass Movement (2013).
In July 2015, he released his 9th album "Survival of the Fittest", via Nice Up! Records (UK) featuring artists from around the world reggae and dancehall, such as Gappy Ranks, Exco Levi and Skarra Mucci.
Blend Mishkin's live sets are primarily reggae, dancehall, hip-hop, jungle and bass, and he has appeared in dozens of bars and clubs in Greece and abroad.

8/11, Blend Mishkin, Rudu Bar, Evadnis 1, Petralona, Time: 22:00.


âœ”K. Beta Live @ Six dogs





Facebook Photo

Constantine Beta returns to his favorite six d.o.g.s for two Friday concerts on November 8 & 15, finding the opportunity to present music from his new ep, "Curious Time", as well as songs, poems and prose from his entire record label.
His return is not accidental, as six d.o.g.s is a space that fits in very well with K. Beta's "urban narrative", with his electronic wanderings, shattering darkness and clear sensitivity.

08 & 15/11, K. Beta Live, 6 d.o.g.s, 6 - 8 Avramiotou Street, Monastiraki, Time: 21:00, Tickets: 12 euro Sale, 14 euro Door.


âœ”Slam! @ Six Dogs





Facebook Photo

The Slam! returns to the Gig Space of six d.o.g.s, presenting its fourth release! With its now known queer aesthetic, inclusive mood, erotic mood and house, acid, electro and dirty disco music invites the city's underground community to a party full of dance, sweat and freedom of expression.
The line up includes Slam! residents ClubKid (Danceteria, six d.o.g.s, Crust) and Fro (BLNK project, Cosmonauts), as well as Sp Ps (Kissing Strangers), one of the city's favorite DJs. The special hosting of the evening is undertaken by Les Salopes.

09/11, 6 d.o.g.s, Avramiotou 6 - 8, Monastiraki, Time: 24:00, Entrance fee: 5 euros.

âœ”Giannis Niarros - "Life Before Grammy's" @ Glass Music Theater




After his constant performances in the theater and in the cinema ("Stella Dormissos" - "Who Killed the Dog at Midnight" - "Orestia" - "South"), the award-winning actor Giannis Niarros leaves the theater for a while to reveal to the audience and its multi-talented musical dimension.
From Monday November 4th and every Monday, Giannis Niarros sets up a stand-up comedy with music with his collaborators and goes upstairs at the Glass Music Theater to present an unexpected, music-theatrical one-man show, "Life Before Grammy's Â».
The actor-musician narrates his relationship with art, music and love, building a unique persona. An eccentric, shopping, sensitive and hilarious musician in search of his musical identity. On his musical journey in various musical styles (blues, rock, funk, pop, disco, jazz, hip-hop, trap, greek) and in theatrical numbers, he will accompany him every Monday from two special guests from the music arena and theater.
Theater, music and stand-up comedy on an unforgettable evening at the UpStage Glass.

"Dinner of the Stupid" @ Kappa Theater




The sold out performance of the last three years continues for the fourth year at the Kappa Theater. Francis Weber's award-winning comedy, which has been loved by audiences and critics alike, opens its doors on October 3.

Case:

Pierre Brossan (Pygmalion Dadakaridis), a wealthy publisher in Paris, organizes a weekly dinner with his wealthy friends ... a special dinner: Everyone finds a 'stupid', invites him to dinner, eat, drink, have fun, have fun and in the end, the one who has brought the most perfect "idiot" is crowned the winner!

After all, which of the two is the idiot? The wages are paid!

A stunning monologue based on the events that marked the life of the great political and spiritual leader, Mahatma Gandhi, through which the basic principles of his teaching are revealed.

In the film "The Power of Truth", Ukrainian director Sergei Loznitsa outlines two aspects of modern Ukraine:
Donbas is an area in eastern Ukraine where the regular army and volunteers are fighting the separatist gangs, backed by Russia. Putin.
